cards.name: Quotation Value by Status
cards.description: Distribution of quotation value across statuses.

native.query:
SELECT status, SUM(quoted_amount) AS total_value
FROM sales_insights.sales_quotations
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY status;

cards.name: Top Customers by Open Quotation Value

native.query:
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(q.quoted_amount) AS open_value
FROM sales_insights.sales_quotations q
JOIN sales_insights.customers c ON c.customer_id = q.customer_id
WHERE q.status IN ('Draft', 'Active')
GROUP BY c.customer_name
ORDER BY open_value DESC
LIMIT 10;
